tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE error_correction_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    allocated_date DATE,
    allocated_by_user VARCHAR(100),
    allocated_to_device VARCHAR(100),
    allocation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE quantum_devices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    quantum_cores INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE error_correction_tasks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    routine_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_devices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    connectivity BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE error_correction_routines (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    complexity INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE routine_allocations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    allocation_id UUID,
    routine_id UUID,
    resource_id UUID,
    allocated BOOLEAN
);
